message: What do people think of the lineup and is anyone else going?
i'm considering it - though I'm already going to Sasquatch which suits my tastes better but also has a lot of the same bands

I thought the line-up looked pretty good, but my friend who has a friend who lives near the site wasn't psyched, so it doesn't look like I'll be going.... oh well, I'll just save my money and possibly go to ACL in the fall
I could also see myself going to Sasquatch, assuming my Seattle-area peeps were into it
